Strong Legal Representation For Victims Of Catastrophic Accidents

Unless you have personally experienced it, it can be difficult to grasp the true impact of a death or catastrophic injury — especially if it was caused by the negligent actions of another.

Injured parties and family members grieve, but many also have trepidations about the future. How will the family be supported? How will medical care and rehabilitation be paid for? What if modifications to the home are necessary?

These are questions that injured parties and family members who have lost loved ones often ask. Fortunately, there are legal options to help financially support what’s to come.

With Decades Of Experience, We Understand The Impact

At Lamkin, Van Eman, Trimble & Dougherty, LLC, we have handled personal injury cases involving catastrophic accidents and death for Columbus and surrounding areas for many years.

We often handle cases involving:

  • Catastrophic auto accidents
  • Dangerous products, chemicals or industrial equipment
  • Fatal medical errors
  • Hazardous property

We have seen the impact that catastrophic injuries and deaths can have, both emotionally and financially, on families.

We know that clients are coming to us during their time of greatest need and that they are depending on us to do all we can to secure the compensation they deserve.

Let Us Use Our Expertise To Represent You

Whether a traumatic brain injury, paralysis, burn, disfigurement or death occurred, rest assured that our lawyers have decades of combined experience to help you and your family seek maximum compensation so you can move forward.

Contact Our Experienced Team Today. Free Consultations.

We have built a reputation during our 50 years of helping clients in Columbus, Ohio, with legal matters. Let us continue to build that reputation with the help we provide to you.

Call 614-360-2706 today. Or if you have questions, send us an email. We collect attorneys’ fees only if we recover compensation for you.
